One of the best campaigns of all time. One of the most unique gameplay experiences of all time. If you like the puzzles, there are literally hundreds of thousands of user made maps to play. It's my all-time favorite.

I don't care what you do with your time and money... so long as portal is involved. Honestly, you can skip portal 1 and not really miss anything. It's a bit like skipping the preface in a book but still starting from the first chapter. After playing through the first chapter you'll understand the scene, plot, and situation. I won't spoil anything, but I can say that this game never gets old. It involves a bunch of puzzles but has a somewhat comedic and somewhat eerie, dystopian twist. Enough of each to have fun while keeping you on your reinforced toes. Besides, it's on sale. You can get both games in a bundle for like a dollar. That's 20+ hours worth of campaign enjoyment(if you're not some speed runner that hates life and plot). I don't know why I'm still rambling. It doesn't take much to become engrossed in the falling apart future.
Very fun. Lots of replay value with community maps.
